name: Lycan Land
description:
Get your weapon and hope you can kill a werewolf before he kills you.

I wanted to make a realistic first person game using the new Unity renderer for computer melting games so I chose to make you suffer through a dark island and a terrifying werewolf.

I gave myself a limit of 7 days to make this demo but I had to extend it to 10 cause of unforeseen difficulties so it is very simple but due to my incredible skills, I made it very flexible for future updates, in case people wish to prolong their suffering on Lycan Land.

If a full game is considered here's what I'd implement:

  • 2 person multiplayer
  • More weapons
  • Traps/sensors/tracking tools
  • Scent masking
  • More detailed world with locations and resources
  • Smarter AI

Basically better hunter/hunted dynamic where you can hunt him instead of just being hopelessly terrified all the time

Recommended system requirements for 1080p 60fps:

  • CPU: Intel i5
  • GPU: GTX 1070

Please note some bugs and strange behavior is possible, game was minimally tested!
